news.title: Waymo to begin testing in Chicago and Charlotte
news.summary: Waymo this week will begin mapping and collecting data in Chicago and Charlotte. The move comes as Waymo announces it is currently operating its robotaxis fully autonomously in 10 US cities.

news.title: Gemini can now automate some multi-step tasks on Android
news.summary: Gemini on Android will be able to automate tasks involving rideshare requests, or grocery or food delivery, says Google.

news.title: OpenAI COO says ads will be ‘an iterative process’
news.summary: COO Brad Lightcap noted that ads can add to the product experience of users if they are done right. He urged to give OpenAI a few months to see how the company fares in rolling out the product.

news.title: OpenClaw creator’s advice to AI builders is to be more playful and allow yourself time to improve
news.summary: Peter Steinberger talks about the creation of his viral AI agent OpenClaw and how being more "playful" makes for a better way to learn AI coding.

news.title: Have hard-won scaling lessons to share? Take the stage at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026
news.summary: Apply to speak at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 by April 17 for a chance to lead a roundtable or breakout session for 1,000 founders and investors. If you’ve built, backed, or operated inside high-growth startups, your experience could shape how the next wave of founders scales.

news.title: Kalshi says it fined a MrBeast editor and a politician for insider trading
news.summary: Kalshi, the prediction betting market, has disclosed its first fines for insider trading, as reported earlier by The Wall Street Journal. news.title: Gemini is getting its first agentic capabilities
news.summary: Google's Gemini AI is getting one step closer to being more like an actual assistant. Starting with some Pixel 10 phones and the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, Gemini will be able to hail an Uber or put together a DoorDash order on its own. It's called task automation, and it starts with a prompt to [&#

news.title: The Galaxy S26 and S26 Plus are more of the same for more money
news.summary: There's a cool new hardware feature debuting at Samsung's annual Unpacked event - but you won't find it on the Galaxy S26 or S26 Plus. While the Ultra model gets a new Privacy Display and avoids a price hike, Samsung's base models are largely software updates that cost more than the outgoing models.

news.title: I’m super impressed with the Galaxy S26 Ultra’s new Privacy Display
news.summary: Maybe it's a reflection of just how slow hardware innovation has been, but the Galaxy S26 Ultra's new Privacy Display, which limits the screen's viewing angle to keep any would-be peepers away, left me totally impressed. It's not a brand-new technology - we've seen it before in laptops - and it was

news.title: Samsung’s still chasing the AirPods with its new Galaxy Buds 4 and Buds 4 Pro
news.summary: The next Galaxy Buds have been announced, and Samsung again mimics Apple in design, ecosystem functionality, and pricing. news.title: Trump's MAHA influencer pick for surgeon general goes before Senate
news.summary: Casey Means holds no active medical license and promotes alternative medicine.

news.title: Pete Hegseth tells Anthropic to fall in line with DoD desires, or else
news.summary: CEO was summoned to Washington after trying to limit military use of its technology.

news.title: Boozy chimps fail urine test, confirm hotly debated theory
news.summary: Spare a thought for the intrepid graduate students who spent last summer in Africa collecting chimp urine.

news.title: WBD says Paramount’s new higher offer could be “superior” to Netflix's
news.summary: WBD's board is still reviewing the offer.

news.title: Following 35% growth, solar has passed hydro on US grid
news.summary: Coal makes a bit of a comeback, if only by accident.

news.title: The AirPods Pro 3 Are $20 Off
news.summary: It's not the flashiest deal, but if you need a new pair, you can snag one at a slight discount.

news.title: Gemini Can Now Book You an Uber or Order a DoorDash Meal on Your Phone. Here’s How It Works
news.summary: Starting with the Samsung Galaxy S26, Google’s Gemini can automate tasks in popular mobile apps. We got a live demo of the new feature in action.

news.title: Samsung Galaxy S26, S26+, and S26 Ultra: Specs, Features, Price, Release Date
news.summary: Samsung’s new phones all get AI enhancements, and the flagship Galaxy S26 Ultra has a Privacy Display that can block the screen from nosy neighbors.

news.title: A White House Staffer Appears to Run Massive Pro-Trump X Account
news.summary: A popular right-wing account that called a video depicting Barack and Michelle Obama as apes "a masterpiece" appears to be run by a White House staffer, according to records reviewed by WIRED.

news.title: MAGA Is Raging Over the Epstein Files. But They’re Not Mad at Donald Trump
news.summary: Trump supporters are angry at the lack of arrests after the latest Epstein file dump but have targeted their ire at Kash Patel, Pam Bondi, and Steve Bannon rather than the president.
